actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 32, United States Code, to provide that Army and Air Force National Guard technicians shall not be required to wear the military uniform while performing their duties in a civilian status.

summary.text: Provides that Army and Air Force National Guard technicians shall not be required to wear the military uniform while performing their duties in a civilian status.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 32, United States Code, to provide that Army and Air Force National Guard technicians shall not be required to wear the military uniform while performing their duties in a civilian status.
